mn128:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosambiyam viharati ghositarame.
mn128:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena kosambiyam bhikkhu bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharanti.
mn128:3.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn128:3.2: “idha, bhante, kosambiyam bhikkhu bhandanajata kalahajata vivadapanna annamannam mukhasattihi vitudanta viharanti.
mn128:3.3: Sadhu, bhante, bhagava yena te bhikkhu tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
mn128:4.1: Atha kho bhagava yena te bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva te bhikkhu etadavoca:
mn128:4.2: “alam, bhikkhave, ma bhandanam, ma kalaham, ma viggaham, ma vivadan”ti.
mn128:4.3: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn128:4.6: appossukko, bhante, bhagava ditthadhammasukhaviharam anuyutto viharatu;
mn128:4.7: mayametena bhandanena kalahena viggahena vivadena pannayissama”ti.
mn128:4.8: Dutiyampi kho bhagava te bhikkhu etadavoca:
mn128:4.9: “alam, bhikkhave, ma bhandanam, ma kalaham, ma viggaham, ma vivadan”ti.
mn128:4.10: Dutiyampi kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn128:4.13: appossukko, bhante, bhagava ditthadhammasukhaviharam anuyutto viharatu;
mn128:4.14: mayametena bhandanena kalahena viggahena vivadena pannayissama”ti.
mn128:4.15: Tatiyampi kho bhagava te bhikkhu etadavoca:
mn128:4.16: “alam, bhikkhave, ma bhandanam, ma kalaham, ma viggaham, ma vivadan”ti.
mn128:4.17: Tatiyampi kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn128:4.20: appossukko, bhante, bhagava ditthadhammasukhaviharam anuyutto viharatu;

mn128:5.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya kosambim pindaya pavisi.
mn128:5.2: Kosambiyam pindaya caritva pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkanto senasanam samsametva pattacivaramadaya thitakova ima gatha abhasi:
mn128:6.40: Eko care na ca papani kayira,
mn128:7.1: Atha kho bhagava thitakova ima gatha bhasitva yena balakalonakaragamo tenupasankami.
mn128:7.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma bhagu balakalonakaragame viharati.
mn128:7.3: Addasa kho ayasma bhagu bhagavantam duratova agacchantam.
mn128:7.4: Disvana asanam pannapesi udakanca padanam dhovanam.
mn128:7.7: Ayasmapi kho bhagu bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
mn128:7.8: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam bhagum bhagava etadavoca:
mn128:7.9: “kacci, bhikkhu, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam, kacci pindakena na kilamasi”ti?
mn128:7.10: “Khamaniyam bhagava, yapaniyam bhagava, na caham, bhante, pindakena kilamami”ti.
mn128:7.11: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam bhagum dhammiya kathaya sandassetva samadapetva samuttejetva sampahamsetva utthayasana yena pacinavamsadayo tenupasankami.
mn128:8.1: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma ca anuruddho ayasma ca nandiyo ayasma ca kimilo pacinavamsadaye viharanti.
mn128:8.2: Addasa kho dayapalo bhagavantam duratova agacchantam.
mn128:9.1: Assosi kho ayasma anuruddho dayapalassa bhagavata saddhim mantayamanassa.
mn128:10.1: Atha kho ayasma anuruddho yenayasma ca nandiyo yenayasma ca kimilo tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantanca nandiyam ayasmantanca kimilam etadavoca:
mn128:10.3: Atha kho ayasma ca anuruddho ayasma ca nandiyo ayasma ca kimilo bhagavantam paccuggantva
mn128:10.4: eko bhagavato pattacivaram patiggahesi, eko asanam pannapesi, eko padodakam upatthapesi.
mn128:10.7: Tepi kho ayasmanto bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
mn128:10.8: Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam anuruddham bhagava etadavoca:
mn128:10.9: “kacci vo, anuruddha, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam, kacci pindakena na kilamatha”ti?
mn128:10.10: “Khamaniyam bhagava, yapaniyam bhagava, na ca mayam, bhante, pindakena kilamama”ti.
mn128:11.1: “Kacci pana vo, anuruddha, samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharatha”ti?
mn128:11.2: “Taggha mayam, bhante, samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharama”ti.
mn128:11.3: “Yatha katham pana tumhe, anuruddha, samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharatha”ti?
mn128:12.4: Tassa mayham, bhante, imesu ayasmantesu mettam kayakammam paccupatthitam avi ceva raho ca,
mn128:12.5: mettam vacikammam paccupatthitam avi ceva raho ca,
mn128:12.6: mettam manokammam paccupatthitam avi ceva raho ca.
mn128:12.8: ‘yannunaham sakam cittam nikkhipitva imesamyeva ayasmantanam cittassa vasena vatteyyan’ti.
mn128:12.9: So kho aham, bhante, sakam cittam nikkhipitva imesamyeva ayasmantanam cittassa vasena vattami.
mn128:12.10: Nana hi kho no, bhante, kaya, ekanca pana manne cittan”ti.
mn128:12.16: Tassa mayham, bhante, imesu ayasmantesu mettam kayakammam paccupatthitam avi ceva raho ca,
mn128:12.17: mettam vacikammam paccupatthitam avi ceva raho ca,
mn128:12.18: mettam manokammam paccupatthitam avi ceva raho ca.
mn128:12.20: ‘yannunaham sakam cittam nikkhipitva imesamyeva ayasmantanam cittassa vasena vatteyyan’ti.
mn128:12.21: So kho aham, bhante, sakam cittam nikkhipitva imesamyeva ayasmantanam cittassa vasena vattami.
mn128:12.22: Nana hi kho no, bhante, kaya, ekanca pana manne cittanti.
mn128:12.23: Evam kho mayam, bhante, samagga sammodamana avivadamana khirodakibhuta annamannam piyacakkhuhi sampassanta viharama”ti.
mn128:13.2: Kacci pana vo, anuruddha, appamatta atapino pahitatta viharatha”ti?
mn128:14.1: “Taggha mayam, bhante, appamatta atapino pahitatta viharama”ti.
mn128:14.2: “Yatha katham pana tumhe, anuruddha, appamatta atapino pahitatta viharatha”ti?
mn128:14.3: “Idha, bhante, amhakam yo pathamam gamato pindaya patikkamati, so asanani pannapeti, paniyam paribhojaniyam upatthapeti, avakkarapatim upatthapeti.
mn128:14.4: Yo paccha gamato pindaya patikkamati—sace hoti bhuttavaseso, sace akankhati, bhunjati; no ce akankhati, appaharite va chaddeti apanake va udake opilapeti—
mn128:14.5: so asanani patisameti, paniyam paribhojaniyam patisameti, avakkarapatim dhovitva patisameti, bhattaggam sammajjati.
mn128:14.6: Yo passati paniyaghatam va paribhojaniyaghatam va vaccaghatam va rittam tuccham so upatthapeti.
mn128:14.7: Sacassa hoti avisayham, hatthavikarena dutiyam amantetva hatthavilanghakena upatthapema, na tveva mayam, bhante, tappaccaya vacam bhindama.
mn128:14.8: Pancahikam kho pana mayam, bhante, sabbarattim dhammiya kathaya sannisidama.
mn128:14.9: Evam kho mayam, bhante, appamatta atapino pahitatta viharama”ti.
mn128:15.2: Atthi pana vo, anuruddha, evam appamattanam atapinam pahitattanam viharatam uttari manussadhamma alamariyananadassanaviseso adhigato phasuviharo”ti?
mn128:15.3: “Idha mayam, bhante, appamatta atapino pahitatta viharanta obhasanceva sanjanama dassananca rupanam.
mn128:15.4: So kho pana no obhaso nacirasseva antaradhayati dassananca rupanam;
mn128:16.1: “Tam kho pana vo, anuruddha, nimittam pativijjhitabbam.
mn128:16.2: Ahampi sudam, anuruddha, pubbeva sambodha anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samano obhasanceva sanjanami dassananca rupanam.
mn128:16.3: So kho pana me obhaso nacirasseva antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:16.5: ‘ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yena me obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanan’ti?
mn128:16.7: ‘vicikiccha kho me udapadi, vicikicchadhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:16.8: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:16.9: Soham tatha karissami yatha me puna na vicikiccha uppajjissati’ti.
mn128:17.1: So kho aham, anuruddha, appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto obhasanceva sanjanami dassananca rupanam.
mn128:17.2: So kho pana me obhaso nacirasseva antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:17.4: ‘ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yena me obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanan’ti?
mn128:17.6: ‘amanasikaro kho me udapadi, amanasikaradhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:17.7: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:17.8: Soham tatha karissami yatha me puna na vicikiccha uppajjissati, na amanasikaro’ti.
mn128:18.3: ‘thinamiddham kho me udapadi, thinamiddhadhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:18.4: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:18.5: Soham tatha karissami yatha me puna na vicikiccha uppajjissati, na amanasikaro, na thinamiddhan’ti.
mn128:19.3: ‘chambhitattam kho me udapadi, chambhitattadhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:19.4: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:19.5: Seyyathapi, anuruddha, puriso addhanamaggappatipanno, tassa ubhatopasse vattaka uppateyyum, tassa tatonidanam chambhitattam uppajjeyya;
mn128:19.6: evameva kho me, anuruddha, chambhitattam udapadi, chambhitattadhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:19.7: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:19.8: Soham tatha karissami yatha me puna na vicikiccha uppajjissati, na amanasikaro, na thinamiddham, na chambhitattan’ti.
mn128:20.3: ‘uppilam kho me udapadi, uppiladhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:20.4: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:20.5: Seyyathapi, anuruddha, puriso ekam nidhimukham gavesanto sakideva pancanidhimukhani adhigaccheyya, tassa tatonidanam uppilam uppajjeyya;
mn128:20.6: evameva kho me, anuruddha, uppilam udapadi, uppiladhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:20.7: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:20.8: Soham tatha karissami yatha me puna na vicikiccha uppajjissati, na amanasikaro, na thinamiddham, na chambhitattam, na uppilan’ti.
mn128:21.3: ‘dutthullam kho me udapadi, dutthulladhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:21.4: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:21.5: Soham tatha karissami yatha me puna na vicikiccha uppajjissati, na amanasikaro, na thinamiddham, na chambhitattam, na uppilam, na dutthullan’ti.
mn128:22.3: ‘accaraddhaviriyam kho me udapadi, accaraddhaviriyadhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:22.4: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:22.5: Seyyathapi, anuruddha, puriso ubhohi hatthehi vattakam galham ganheyya, so tattheva patameyya;
mn128:22.6: evameva kho me, anuruddha, accaraddhaviriyam udapadi, accaraddhaviriyadhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:22.7: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:22.8: Soham tatha karissami yatha me puna na vicikiccha uppajjissati, na amanasikaro, na thinamiddham, na chambhitattam, na uppilam, na dutthullam, na accaraddhaviriyan’ti.
mn128:23.3: ‘atilinaviriyam kho me udapadi, atilinaviriyadhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:23.4: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:23.5: Seyyathapi, anuruddha, puriso vattakam sithilam ganheyya, so tassa hatthato uppateyya;
mn128:23.6: evameva kho me, anuruddha, atilinaviriyam udapadi, atilinaviriyadhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:23.7: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:23.8: Soham tatha karissami yatha me puna na vicikiccha uppajjissati, na amanasikaro, na thinamiddham, na chambhitattam, na uppilam, na dutthullam, na accaraddhaviriyam, na atilinaviriyan’ti.
mn128:24.3: ‘abhijappa kho me udapadi, abhijappadhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:24.4: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:24.5: Soham tatha karissami yatha me puna na vicikiccha uppajjissati, na amanasikaro, na thinamiddham, na chambhitattam, na uppilam, na dutthullam, na accaraddhaviriyam, na atilinaviriyam, na abhijappa’ti.
mn128:25.3: ‘nanattasanna kho me udapadi, nanattasannadhikarananca pana me samadhi cavi.
mn128:25.4: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:25.5: Soham tatha karissami yatha me puna na vicikiccha uppajjissati, na amanasikaro, na thinamiddham, na chambhitattam, na uppilam, na dutthullam, na accaraddhaviriyam, na atilinaviriyam, na abhijappa, na nanattasanna’ti.
mn128:26.1: So kho aham, anuruddha, appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto obhasanceva sanjanami dassananca rupanam.
mn128:26.2: So kho pana me obhaso nacirasseva antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:26.4: ‘ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yena me obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanan’ti.
mn128:26.6: ‘atinijjhayitattam kho me rupanam udapadi, atinijjhayitattadhikarananca pana me rupanam samadhi cavi.
mn128:26.7: Samadhimhi cute obhaso antaradhayati dassananca rupanam.
mn128:26.8: Soham tatha karissami yatha me puna na vicikiccha uppajjissati, na amanasikaro, na thinamiddham, na chambhitattam, na uppilam, na dutthullam, na accaraddhaviriyam, na atilinaviriyam, na abhijappa, na nanattasanna, na atinijjhayitattam rupanan’ti.
mn128:27.1: So kho aham, anuruddha, ‘vicikiccha cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva vicikiccham cittassa upakkilesam pajahim,
mn128:27.2: ‘amanasikaro cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva amanasikaram cittassa upakkilesam pajahim,
mn128:27.3: ‘thinamiddham cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva thinamiddham cittassa upakkilesam pajahim,
mn128:27.4: ‘chambhitattam cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva chambhitattam cittassa upakkilesam pajahim,
mn128:27.5: ‘uppilam cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva uppilam cittassa upakkilesam pajahim,
mn128:27.6: ‘dutthullam cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva dutthullam cittassa upakkilesam pajahim,
mn128:27.7: ‘accaraddhaviriyam cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva accaraddhaviriyam cittassa upakkilesam pajahim,
mn128:27.8: ‘atilinaviriyam cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva atilinaviriyam cittassa upakkilesam pajahim,
mn128:27.9: ‘abhijappa cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva abhijappam cittassa upakkilesam pajahim,
mn128:27.10: ‘nanattasanna cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva nanattasannam cittassa upakkilesam pajahim,
mn128:27.11: ‘atinijjhayitattam rupanam cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva atinijjhayitattam rupanam cittassa upakkilesam pajahim.
mn128:28.1: So kho aham, anuruddha, appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto obhasanhi kho sanjanami, na ca rupani passami;
mn128:28.2: rupani hi kho passami, na ca obhasam sanjanami:
mn128:28.5: ‘ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yvaham obhasanhi kho sanjanami na ca rupani passami;
mn128:28.6: rupani hi kho passami na ca obhasam sanjanami—
mn128:28.7: kevalampi rattim, kevalampi divam, kevalampi rattindivan’ti.
mn128:28.9: ‘yasminhi kho aham samaye rupanimittam amanasikaritva obhasanimittam manasi karomi, obhasanhi kho tasmim samaye sanjanami, na ca rupani passami.
mn128:28.10: Yasmim panaham samaye obhasanimittam amanasikaritva rupanimittam manasi karomi, rupani hi kho tasmim samaye passami na ca obhasam sanjanami—
mn128:28.11: kevalampi rattim, kevalampi divam, kevalampi rattindivan’ti.
mn128:29.1: So kho aham, anuruddha, appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto parittanceva obhasam sanjanami, parittani ca rupani passami;
mn128:29.2: appamananceva obhasam sanjanami, appamanani ca rupani passami:
mn128:29.5: ‘ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo yvaham parittanceva obhasam sanjanami, parittani ca rupani passami;
mn128:29.6: appamananceva obhasam sanjanami, appamanani ca rupani passami—
mn128:29.7: kevalampi rattim, kevalampi divam, kevalampi rattindivan’ti.
mn128:29.9: ‘yasmim kho me samaye paritto samadhi hoti, parittam me tasmim samaye cakkhu hoti.
mn128:29.10: Soham parittena cakkhuna parittanceva obhasam sanjanami, parittani ca rupani passami.
mn128:29.11: Yasmim pana me samaye appamano samadhi hoti, appamanam me tasmim samaye cakkhu hoti.
mn128:29.12: Soham appamanena cakkhuna appamananceva obhasam sanjanami, appamanani ca rupani passami—
mn128:29.13: kevalampi rattim, kevalampi divam, kevalampi rattindivan’ti.
mn128:30.1: Yato kho me, anuruddha, ‘vicikiccha cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva vicikiccha cittassa upakkileso pahino ahosi,
mn128:30.2: ‘amanasikaro cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva amanasikaro cittassa upakkileso pahino ahosi,
mn128:30.3: ‘thinamiddham cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva thinamiddham cittassa upakkileso pahino ahosi,
mn128:30.4: ‘chambhitattam cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva chambhitattam cittassa upakkileso pahino ahosi,
mn128:30.5: ‘uppilam cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva uppilam cittassa upakkileso pahino ahosi,
mn128:30.6: ‘dutthullam cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva dutthullam cittassa upakkileso pahino ahosi,
mn128:30.7: ‘accaraddhaviriyam cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva accaraddhaviriyam cittassa upakkileso pahino ahosi,
mn128:30.8: ‘atilinaviriyam cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva atilinaviriyam cittassa upakkileso pahino ahosi,
mn128:30.9: ‘abhijappa cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva abhijappa cittassa upakkileso pahino ahosi,
mn128:30.10: ‘nanattasanna cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva nanattasanna cittassa upakkileso pahino ahosi,
mn128:30.11: ‘atinijjhayitattam rupanam cittassa upakkileso’ti—iti viditva atinijjhayitattam rupanam cittassa upakkileso pahino ahosi.
mn128:31.2: ‘ye kho me cittassa upakkilesa te me pahina.
mn128:31.4: So kho aham, anuruddha, savitakkampi savicaram samadhim bhavesim, avitakkampi vicaramattam samadhim bhavesim, avitakkampi avicaram samadhim bhavesim, sappitikampi samadhim bhavesim, nippitikampi samadhim bhavesim, satasahagatampi samadhim bhavesim, upekkhasahagatampi samadhim bhavesim.
mn128:32.1: Yato kho me, anuruddha, savitakkopi savicaro samadhi bhavito ahosi, avitakkopi vicaramatto samadhi bhavito ahosi, avitakkopi avicaro samadhi bhavito ahosi, sappitikopi samadhi bhavito ahosi, nippitikopi samadhi bhavito ahosi, satasahagatopi samadhi bhavito ahosi, upekkhasahagatopi samadhi bhavito ahosi.
mn128:32.3: akuppa me cetovimutti. Ayamantima jati, natthi dani punabbhavo”ti.
mn128:32.5: Attamano ayasma anuruddho bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditi.
